Text: No English subtitles and the spoken language is not English.

That's the original dub with Finnish-and-Mandarin dialogue; included subtitles are in Vietnamese. You can find English subtitles from quite a few places; I watched the movie with subs from http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3267665/jade-warrior-en (you have to time-shift these about +6.5 seconds).

Currently there are only three rips of it on TPB (none of the alternate titles from http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0416871/releaseinfo#akas return any hits); the other two have burned-in Swedish and Finnish subtitles, respectively.
